Package suncertify.db

Provides the core functionality of the program.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DB
    Provides the business logic rules.
    DBPlusQuery
    Enhances DB's use cases with another not originally contemplated.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomerRecord
    Represents the object-oriented mapping of a customer record.
    Data
    Singleton that acts as a cache between the user(s) and the database file, and implements the business logic use cases.
    DBSchema
    Provides access to the decoded data constants of the database file header.
    LockManager
    Thread-safe class responsible for locking and unlocking object-oriented mapped customer records, managing and verifying the validity of security identification tokens, also known as "lockcookies".
    SchemaVerifier
    Auxiliary class that checks the mapped object-oriented primitive and reference types decoded from the database file bytes, against a normative database schema.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BookingException
    Indicates that a customer record is already booked.
    DuplicateKeyException
    Indicates an attempt to insert a new customer record, with a repeated client company name and geographical location.
    RecordNotFoundException
    Indicates that a customer record doesn't exist, or is deemed as deleted.

Package suncertify.db Description

Provides the core functionality of the program. Encompasses the business logic rules. Data is the central piece of this architecture. It is a Singleton class which acts a cache between the program and the database file. It is there also, where the business logic rules are implemented.
